UniCAP: A Unified Computing Engine for Fast Data Processing

The UniCAP project is a distributed computing engine for executing data parallel programmes, which consist of a complex of directed-acyclic-graph (DAG) of tasks. It unifies Batch Processing and Stream Processing into one system using a timed dataflow model. Clients can either use UniCAP in NTU Big Data Platform (BDP), or build from source codes.

The main design themes for UniCAP are:

Timed Dataflow

This project is maintained by sunpengsdu
